org.sql: SELECT spree_products.* FROM spree_products INNER JOIN spree_product_promotion_rules ON spree_products.id = spree_product_promotion_rules.product_id WHERE spree_products.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_product_promotion_rules.promotion_rule_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT spree_products.* FROM spree_products INNER JOIN spree_product_promotion_rules ON spree_products.id = spree_product_promotion_rules.product_id WHERE spree_products.deleted_at IS NULL AND spree_product_promotion_rules.promotion_rule_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
